key.enchdesc.title: 附魔說明
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: 減少來源於彈射物的傷害
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: 對不死生物造成額外傷害
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: 對節肢生物造成額外傷害
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: 被開採的方塊掉落本身
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: 減少物品掉耐久的機率
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: 射箭不會消耗普通箭矢
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: 提高釣魚時獲得寶藏的機率
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: 損耗經驗以修補工具的耐久度
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: 被詛咒物品穿在身上後除非玩家處於創造模式，否則無法卸下
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: 被詛咒物品會在玩家死亡時消失
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: 使擲出後的三叉戟返回，附魔等級越高，三叉戟返回的用時越短
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: 對水生生物造成額外傷害
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: 將玩家向擲出三叉戟的方向發射，僅在水中或雨中生效
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: 在雨天召喚閃電攻擊生物，僅在雷暴時生效
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: 消耗一支箭可射出三隻箭矢
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: 提升在靈魂砂和靈魂土上的移動速度。
enchdesc.jei.compatible_items.title: 相容的物品
enchantment.gofish.deepfry.desc: Instantly cooks fish that are caught.
enchantment.biomemakeover.depth_curse.de: Drags you to the ocean floor.
enchantment.biomemakeover.flammability_c: Being set on fire lasts longer.
enchantment.biomemakeover.inaccuracy_cur: Reduces your accuracy with bows and crossbows.
enchantment.magna.gigantism_curse.desc: Allows hammer to destroy 5x5 areas instead of 3x3.
enchantment.betterend.end_veil.desc: When applied to helmet, allows the player to stare directly into the eyes of endermen.
enchantment.zoob.from_the_abyss.desc: Gives you regeneration if you attack a land mob with axe or sword. Massively damages the weapon if you attack a water mob.
enchantment.curses.poverty.desc: Has a chance to prevent loot from dropping when an entity is killed.
enchantment.curses.fragility.desc: Has a chance to break the item when useds.
enchantment.curses.instability.desc: Causes an explosion if the wearer is on fire or the item damages a burning enemy.
enchantment.curses.death.desc: Instantly kills anyone who equips or holds an item with this curse.
Gives abilities similar to an enderman.
enchantment.moenchantments.potionretensi: Stores potions in the item for use later.
enchantment.moenchantments.tamedprotecti: Prevents the weapon from damaging your pets.
enchantment.moenchantments.treefeller.de: Chops down large portions of trees.
enchantment.moenchantments.soulbound.des: The item will not drop when you die.
enchantment.moenchantments.grapnel.desc: Pulls targets toward the damage source.
enchantment.moenchantments.slippery.desc: The item may slip out of your hand.
Foods with negative effects will give positive effects instead.
